name: Trapped: Crusade - Public Demo V1
description:
This is the first public/playable demo for Trapped: Crusade.

Explore the world of Eedim in this stylized movement shooter.

The demo contains 2 levels, Unroyal and The Shattered Plains.

In Unroyal, you will learn the basics, collect crystal currency, accept & complete quests (including Slime Girl Combat & Training Courses), Buy equipment and upgrades, all in the Training Grounds and HQ of Unroyal Security.

In the Shattered Plains, you will double jump, glide and wallrun your way through ruins on floating islands. Find all the hidden chests, collect crystal currency and fight off the slime infestation (including Slime Girls, Turrets and 2 Bosses).
